titleStmt.title: A new declaration from eight regiments in the Army, viz. The Generals Life-Guard, Lieutenant Gen. Cromwels Regiment. Commissary Gen. Iretons Regiment. Col. Rainsboroughs Reg. Collonel Whaleyes Regiment. Colonell Bark[s]teeds Regiment. Colonell Overttons Regiment. And Colonell Hewsons Regiment. Presented, to his Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax neere Kingston, at his advance towards Windsor; concerning their loyalty to his Majesty, their due respect to his Excellency, and their desires touching the publique weale of the Kingdome. Also the copy of a letter from the Army, discovering a further conspiracie against the Parliament, Army, and Kingdome, neer Mile-Inne, London. With divers particulars touching the same. Imprimatur, Gilb. Mabbott.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
England and Wales. Army.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.C. for G. Horton, and are to be sold in the Old Bayley, and neere the Royall Exchange in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
